channel.title: Ace Attorney Forum Mafia - Town Victory!
channel.description:
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/9/99/Ace_Attorney_Logo.png #
[color=skyblue]Ace Attorney Forum Mafia[/color]
Without further ado, let's get to the sign u- ![hold%20it|300x200](upload://8YsW8u0w7LpI5McVbLSq3NqfFv2.png) Oh, right. The rules! # [color=skyblue]Gameplay[/color] Nights will last 24 hours. Days will last 48 hours. Voting will be deadline based for the first day, and majority will be enabled for every day after that. I think that concludes everything... now, onto signups! ![NotSoFast!|300x200](upload://ncitxu4nCfXddDcsROQyfMtnV9u.png) Oh. The roles, of course! # [color=skyblue]Roles[/color] All roles will be of characters from the Ace Attorney Universe. A role's flavor will not determine it's alignment. Phoenix could be a mafioso and Stepladders could be a member of the town! An example rolecard would look like this: ___ ![Charley|207x391](upload://vrlyU6EItNSSKo7uyCXOD0XnDHm.jpg) # [color=green]Charley[/color] Sitting in Phoenix's office, given to him by his old mentor, you stand proud! You are a **1-shot Treestumping House Plant**. Once per game, during the night phase you may stump another living player. A treestumped player may not vote during the day, does not count towards majority, cannot die nor can they use any abilities for the rest of this game. ___ The role list is closed, and as such this class will not be used in this game. It's just an example! # [color=skyblue]Player List[/color] 1. [color=red]**MaximusPrime**[/color] - [**Sent to Jail D4** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-4-19-29-alive-objection/68437/7754?u=marluxion) - [color=red]**Mia Fey**[/color] 2. Livicus 3. [color=red]**Boss110**[/color] - [**Died N3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-3-22-29-alive-suspense/68437/7240?u=marluxion) - [color=red]**Ted Tonate**[/color] 5. [color=red]**Simon**[/color] - [**Died N1** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-night-1-28-29-alive-seeking-replacements/68437/3629?u=marluxion) - [color=green]**Bobby Fulbright**[/color] 6. [color=red]**HTM**[/color] - [**Died N1** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-night-1-28-29-alive-seeking-replacements/68437/3629?u=marluxion) - [color=green]**Kristoph Gavin**[/color] 7. [color=red]**Vulgard**[/color] - [**Modkilled D3**]([color=red]) - [color=green]**Rayfa Padma Khuraâ€™in**[/color] 8. Marcus 9. [color=red]**Icibalus**[/color] - [**Sent to Jail D2** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-3-22-29-alive-suspense/68437/6122?u=marluxion) - [color=red]**Dhurke Sahdmadi**[/color] 10. [color=red]**Celeste**[/color] - [**Died N2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-3-22-29-alive-suspense/68437/6126?u=marluxion) - [color=green]**Phoenix Wright**[/color] 11. orangeandblack5 12. [color=red]~~eevee~~ **overthebin**[/color] - [**Sent to Jail D6**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-6-13-29-alive-pressing-pursuit/68437/8644?u=queen_alfa) - [color=red]**Justine Courtney**[/color] 13. [color=red]**Damafaud**[/color] - [**Sent to Jail D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-3-22-29-alive-suspense/68437/7236?u=marluxion) - [color=green]**Franziska von Karma**[/color] 14. [color=red]**PoisonedSquid**[/color] - [**Died N2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-3-22-29-alive-suspense/68437/6126?u=marluxion) - [color=red]**Shelly De Killer**[/color] 15. Blizer 16. [color=red]**Firekitten**[/color] - [**Died N4**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-4-19-29-alive-objection/68437/7754?u=marluxion) - [color=grey]Winston Payne?[/color] 17. CaptainNerbins 18. Hippolytus 19. Memesky 20. [color=red]**Parfait**[/color] - [**Sent to Jail D5**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-5-17-29-alive-cornered/68437/8368?u=queen_alfa) - [color=red]**???**[/color] 21. [color=red]~~Qwert~~ **Infernal**[/color] - [**Died N5**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-6-16-29-alive-pressing-pursuit/68437/8371?u=queen_alfa) - [color=green]**Luke Atmey**[/color] 22. ~~Prealpha~~ Shurian 23. ~~psychoneirik~~ Queen_Alfa 24. [color=red]~~Omfgcookies~~ **Sam17z**[/color] - [**Modkilled D6**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-6-13-29-alive-pressing-pursuit/68437/8419?u=queen_alfa) - [color=green]**Klavier Gavin**[/color] 25. [color=red]**Sarun**[/color] - [**Sent to Jail D1** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-1-29-29-alive-seeking-replacements/68437/3622?u=marluxion) - [color=green]**Miles Edgeworth**[/color] 26. [color=red]**Solic**[/color] - [**Died N1** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-night-1-28-29-alive-seeking-replacements/68437/3629?u=marluxion) - [color=green]**Dick Gumshoe**[/color] 27. [color=red]~~Whammerist~~ **Babbage**[/color] - [**Modkilled D5/N5**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-5-17-29-alive-cornered/68437/8370?u=queen_alfa) - [color=red]**Simon Blackquill**[/color] 28. Luxy 29. Captain 30. Insanity Backups: ## [color=lightblue]Links[/color] :chains: [**Chapter 0: Turnabout Beginnings** - D1 Start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-pre-sign-ups-29-29/68437/455?u=marluxion) [**Chapter 0: Breakthrough** - Margaret is a member of the town. ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-1-29-29-alive-seeking-replacements/68437/1931?u=marluxion) [**Chapter 0: Intermission** - D1 End / D2 Start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-1-29-29-alive-seeking-replacements/68437/3623?u=marluxion) [**Chapter 0: End** - D2 End - Icibalus has been caught! ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-3-22-29-alive-suspense/68437/6122?u=marluxion) [**Chapter 1: Turnabout Assassin** - D3 Start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-3-22-29-alive-suspense/68437/6126?u=marluxion) [**Chapter 2: Explosive Turnabout** - D3 End / D4 Start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-3-22-29-alive-suspense/68437/7236?u=marluxion) [**Chapter 3: Turnabout from the Past** - D4 End / D5 Start - MaximusPrime has been caught!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ace-attorney-forum-mafia-day-4-19-29-alive-objection/68437/7754?u=marluxion)
